keyword: how many calories are in a pancake
title: How Many Calories Are in a Pancake?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a pancake, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Pancake?
assumptions: Standard 4-inch diameter plain pancake (~38 g), made from basic batter (flour, milk, egg, butter), cooked on non-stick surface without added oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, ingredients, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard pancake contains about 80 calories and 12 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Whole wheat flour instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories are in a pancake?
faqs.a: About 80 calories for a standard 4-inch plain pancake.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one pancake?
faqs.a: Approximately 12 g of carbohydrates, including 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a pancake have much protein?
faqs.a: Around 2.5 g of protein per standard pancake.

faqs.q: How does pancake size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger pancakes (6-inch) can have 120+ calories; smaller ones under 60.
A basic pancake has about 200 mg sodium; toppings like bacon increase it.
